ProjectTitle: Designing deserts? The role of eighteenth-century ideas and drainage schemes in the long-term landscape change of the Campine area (Belgium)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/07/2023
You have only copied the data management information that was asked for in the grant application.

Now that the research project is ongoing, you need to develop a full data management plan using the Flemish Standard Data Management Plan template. You can do this using the dmponline.be tool or a Word template. Guidance on how to do this here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp
label: good with suggestions
